attributes.action: Make specific MP's or Government personnel accountable to decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a decision is made within a Government department and implemented, a list of people or the person who approved the decision must be attached to that decision. If a pos+ outcome results, that person or group of people can be praised or rewarded and if a Neg- result occurs, then suitable action may be taken. It would seem that if a similar financial error was made by a company chairman, she/he could/would lose their job but no specific person or group ever seems to been accountable within the Government.
